name: Go to school, Timothée !! [Ludum Dare October 2020]
name_original: Go to school, Timothée !! [Ludum Dare October 2020]
description:
Our game for the Ludum Dare 47 !

A game by  Théo Legouis (art) and Hortense Frouin (the rest).

A short platformer (with a twist ! But we're not going to spoil you and tell you the twist ! Unless you want to because we made our game a little too difficult and you can't find it Ok, maybe you can know then. Stop reading this paragraph if you want to find it by yourself !!  The twist is it's a platformer mixed with a point and click ! That was a big build up so I hope you're not disappointed, but eh, I didnt promise you it was a good twist, just said there was a twist, so if your expectations were big, it's on you. Im just writing alot of words to bury the spoiler in a big paragraph because Im too lazy to find out how to make a HTML spoiler, honestly. Hope it worked. If not, sorry ! )

You can find more of us on: 

Hortense: https://www.artstation.com/hortensefrouin

Théo:https://www.instagram.com/teolehog/

Thanks for playing our game, have a nice day !!
